First Party Collection/Use: This Policy explains how we collect and use your data and how you can control your information.
We use the information we collect in order to operate, deliver, and maintain our Services.
We offer personalized Services to Snapchatters. One of the ways we do this is by showing you content that is relevant to you or we think you may enjoy based on the information you share with us.
Third Party Sharing/Collection: We share your information with our service providers, who process that information on our behalf.
We share your information with business and integrated partners in order to provide the Services. For example, you can use OpenTable within Snapchat to reserve a table.
User Access/Edit/Deletion: You can access and edit most of your basic account information right in our Services.
If you want to delete your account, learn how here.
Data Retention: We keep information as long as you tell us to, and otherwise as long as we need it to provide our Services, or as required by law.
Data Security: We use your information to enhance the safety and security of our Services, verify Snapchatter identity, and prevent fraud or other unauthorized or illegal activity.
International/Specific Audiences: Our Services are not directed to children under the age of 13, and you must confirm that you are 13 years or older in order to create an account and use our Services.
We do our best to keep our policies as simple as possible, but depending on where you live, you have some additional rights.
Policy Change: We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. But when we do, we’ll let you know one way or another.
User Choice/Control: We want you to be in control of your information, so we provide you with a range of tools.
Introductory/Generic: Welcome to Snap Inc.’s Privacy Policy.
Privacy contact information: Have any questions about the information here or wish to contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO)? You can contact us here.
